name: A Maze Ball (kcy4870)
description:
A Maze Ball

A Project Made by Kevin Yap

Level 1: A standard maze. Start in the top left corner and move to the bottom right.

Level 2: Simple parkour area, jump from platform to platform to the end.

Level 3: A treacherous environment wrought with lasers and swinging hammers. Find the button that unlocks the door to victory.
